description:
Web novel lovers! Welcome to Litrad, your must-read app to discover tens of thousands of original, fast-updating web novels, short stories, e-books, and fantasy fiction. Download NOW to enjoy reading at your leisure!

**Here's what's waiting for you**
- Personal library auto sync on every device
- 20000+ amazing stories here in one app, with special daily recommendations
- Read the latest chapters anywhere anytime.
- A rich interactive reading experience - share your thoughts and discuss plots with authors and the community.
- Unlimited reading experience - more new books hit the shelf every month!

**Massive Tags. Help you locate your favorite books in 5 minutes**
Fantasy, Royal Romance, Dark Romance, Werewolf & luna, Supernatural, Dragon, Vampire, Billionaire, Mafia and so on. We got it all!

**Trending web novel at Litrad:**
- 「Annulled Love, Mafia's Fall: She Bulldozed All」
- 「Annulled Love, Mafia's Fall: She Bulldozed All」
- 「A Divorce He Regrets」
- 「The Queen Returns: Pampered By Her Three Powerhouse Brothers」

About Auto-Renewable Subscriptions
- Auto-renewable subscriptions in the app include Check-in Coins Packs.
- Coins Packs: $20, $30, $50 and $100.
- Payment: The purchase will be charged to your iTunes account.
- Renewal: When you subscribe to check-in coins packs, your subscription will renew automatically. You'll be charged at the start of each billing cycle until you cancel your subscription. Subscriptions are automatically charged each billing period, whether monthly or another period, and you may be charged no more than 24 hours before the beginning of each billing period.
- Cancellation: You may cancel a subscription at any time more than 24 hours before your renewal date.
- Privacy Policy: https://staticpage-en.cdreader.com/EN/AppPrivacyPolicy.html?client_proid=1001&mt=1
- Subscription Terms and Conditions: https://promotion.cdreader.com/CheckinCard/agreement.html
- Terms of Use: https://staticpage-en.cdreader.com/EN/termsofservice.html?client_proid=1001&mt=1

Any questions or advice? Please contact us:
Email: SupportRU1@36you.cn
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/Litrad-106037851545175

app_name: Lok L0k: Watch TV drama, Movie
description:
Lok L0k — Your All-Access Pass to the World of Movies.

This ultimate movie companion is designed for film lovers who want it all — discovery, excitement, and a front-row seat to every story.

- Browse Your Way – Explore films by genre, rating, or release date, and find exactly what fits your mood.

- Never Miss a Premiere – Get instant alerts for new releases and upcoming must-see premieres.

- Your Watchlist, Your Rules – Save the titles you can’t wait to see and track the ones you’ve conquered.

- Rate & Relive – Share your take on movies and TV shows, and watch reviews from critics and fans alongside cast info and full details.

- IPTV Smart Player – Enjoy smooth, integrated playback with a built-in, smart viewing experience.

Download the app and step into a cinematic universe like never before.

Data Source Transparency

All movie and TV details — including images, ratings, and descriptions — are powered by The Movie Database (TMDB).
We use the TMDB API to bring you this rich library of content, but we are not endorsed or certified by TMDB.

Important Disclaimer

This app is an entertainment guide, not a streaming service.
We are not affiliated with, or endorsed by, any third-party content providers or film studios.
No movies or TV shows are streamed or hosted within the app.
All trademarks, copyrights, and other intellectual property remain the property of their respective owners.

Takyk – Новости, которым можно доверять
Следите за последними событиями в Туркменистане и мире с официальным приложением Takyk. Надёжные новости, интервью, видео — всё в одном месте.

- Актуальные новости
- Видео и интервью
- Мнения
- Уведомления о важных событиях

The CNN app is your destination for unrivaled, fact-based reporting. Stay informed at every turn as the story breaks through short-form videos, interactives, articles, podcasts, live audio and more. Easily discover the day's top news from politics, health, world news, climate and beyond.

Download the CNN app to start making sense of the world today.

START STREAMING THE CNN EXPERIENCE TODAY.
Now watch unlimited streaming, including 24/7 global news, daily programs from trusted journalists, award-winning shows and films, and more.

FOLLOW LIVE UPDATES.
Set custom alerts and notifications so you can follow developing stories. Our "live update" articles evolve as the news comes in, giving you accurate updates as they happen.

WATCH THE STORY UNFOLD.
See it for yourself with CNN’s live video or be in the know quickly with CNN Shorts.

STAY SHARP WITH EXPERT INSIGHTS.
Delivering in-depth analysis and context that matters from award-winning journalists, so you're prepared for what's next.

DIVE DEEPER WITH LIVE REPORTING.
Enjoy a 5-minute preview of CNN live. Unlock unlimited viewing, including CNN's original series and documentary collection, CNN, CNN International, and HLN by logging into your TV provider. Stay caught up with video clips, no login necessary.

TAKE A BREAK.
From travel and style news to the latest in entertainment, discover feel-good stories and get a daily dose of positivity.

LISTEN TO STAY CONNECTED.
Listen to top headlines anywhere you go with live audio from CNN, CNN en Español, CNN International and HLN. Hear the week's biggest and most talked-about stories with the "1 Thing" podcast.
 
DIGITAL SUBSCRIPTION (Available in the United States)
All Access plan - The premium CNN experience: streaming, exclusive videos, articles, and more.
• 24/7 global news
• Live coverage
• Exclusive videos
• Original series
• Award-winning films
• Unlimited articles

Basic plan - The basic CNN experience
• Unlimited articles

Your subscription will automatically renew at the then-current price of your plan unless you cancel at least 24 hours before the renewal. Your App Store account will automatically be charged at the same price for renewal within 24 hours prior to the end of your current subscription period. You can manage your subscription by visiting the App Store or under Settings on your Apple device.

By downloading the CNN app, you agree to:

Relax and dive into a great story! Enjoy our bestselling series! Millions of readers can’t get enough of our library of unputdownable novels. Dive into an extensive collection of audiobooks, ebook novels, and immersive fiction stories. New chapters and interactive stories are added every day.

BINGE-READ / SNACK-READ
* Unstoppable addictive stories span multiple seasons, and new chapters released daily!
* 15 minutes per chapter, read at your own pace, whenever wherever you are, any time you want.

A LIBRARY FOR EVERY DESIRE
* Fall in love with our epic novels and unlimited fiction series.
* 400 ebooks to choose from, featuring chat fiction and other immersive elements
* Exclusive online novels from best-selling authors
* Follow your favorite books and writers as we craft a never-ending story.

A REVOLUTIONARY READING EXPERIENCE
* More immersive, interactive, and engaging than a traditional book.
* Turn on/off music, ambiance, and sound effects.
* Watch your favorite characters' conversation unfold in text messages too!
* Offline reading anytime, anywhere.

STORIES IN BOTH BOOK/AUDIOBOOK FORMATS
* Read or Listen? Whatever your mood and the situation calls for.
* Enjoy stories anywhere, any time.

BOOK CLUB
* Join the discussion online with our vibrant Book Club community
* Join our Facebook group: https://bit.ly/3j9af5g
* Follow us on Instagram: @galatea.stories

DARK MODE / NIGHT READING
* Turn on the Dark Mode for cozy night reading

HELP SUPPORT INDEPENDENT WRITERS
* Support Galatea writers by purchasing chapters.
* For unlimited access to all of our stories, we have subscription packages!

LANGUAGES
* English, German, French, Spanish, Russian, and Portuguese… more on the way.

The immersive reading app Galatea was developed by Inkitt (Free Novels Inc.)
By using Galatea, you agree to our Terms of Use and Community Guidelines (https://getgalatea.com/terms/) and to our Privacy Policy (https://getgalatea.com/privacy)

HappyMood – Discover Games Made for You

Are you a true gamer looking for one place to explore everything about games? HappyMoods is your ultimate companion! With a huge database of games, you can easily search, discover, and enjoy all the details you need in one simple app.
Explore a Massive Library HappyMood Browse through a wide range of games across different styles and categories. Whether you love action, adventure, puzzle, or strategy, HappyMods brings everything together in one place.
Watch Trailers & Gameplay Before playing, get a real taste of the game! Watch trailers and gameplay videos to see exactly what the game looks like.
Save Your Favorites HappyMood Build your own personalized collection of favorite games. Add the ones you love and come back to them anytime.
Track Games You Like Never lose track of a game again. Follow the games you’re interested in and keep them organized in your list.
Choose Your Mood Not sure what to play? Select your mood and HappyMod will recommend games that match how you feel at that moment. Fun, relaxing, scary, or exciting – there’s always a game waiting for you.
Test Your Knowledge Think you know everything about games? Try our quiz and challenge yourself with fun questions to see how much of a gaming expert you are.
All-in-One Gaming Experience HappyMood makes it easy for you to discover new games, keep track of your favorites, enjoy videos, and even test your knowledge. It’s everything a gamer needs – simple, clear, and always fun.
With HappyMod, finding the perfect game has never been easier.

Architectural Digest (AD), the international authority on design and architecture, offers exclusive access to the world’s most beautiful homes and the fascinating people who live in them. Bringing its audience a wealth of information on architecture and interior design, art and antiques, travel destinations, and extraordinary products, its AD100 list of top architects and designers is one of the industry’s most relied-upon indexes of talent.

The Architectural Digest digital edition app is free to download. Subscribers receive unlimited access. Non-subscribers may access a selection of complimentary articles each month.

AUTOMATIC-RENEWAL: Your payment method will be automatically charged at the frequency and price noted in the subscription offer you select, until you cancel. To cancel, you must update your App Store Subscriptions settings at least 24 hours before the end of the current subscription term. No refunds once payment is made.

Founded in June 2019, Business Turkmenistan (BT) online publication is your go-to source for up-to-date and reliable business news and information in Turkmenistan.

BT meticulously curates news and information, ensuring they come from trusted sources and provide valuable insights into the local business landscape. Whether you're interested in finance, investments, trade, entrepreneurship, or industry updates, BT platform provides a comprehensive overview of the business sector in Turkmenistan.

The platform also features quotations from The State Commodity and Raw Materials Exchange of Turkmenistan (SCRMET). These quotations provide prices and other relevant terms for commodities and materials traded at SCRMET.

BT also features tenders announced in Turkmenistan. It provides daily information on these tenders, enabling businesses to explore opportunities and participate in relevant procurement processes. Additionally, BT website provides a dedicated section for job postings by companies operating in the country.

Licensed by the Turkmenaragatnashyk agency to operate in Turkmenistan, Business Turkmenistan is published in three languages: Turkmen, Russian, and English.

Сканворды на русском языке без всяких сомнений уникальное явление в мире. Ни на каком другом языке вы не найдете столько литературных вопросов, вопросов с юмором, вопросов с контекстом происходящего в мире сегодня. И всё это в обычных кроссвордах, хотя, казалось бы, какая ерунда. Русский народ – народ слова. И любит своё слово, и держит своё слово, и относится к слову как к самому дорогому.

Сканворды в приложении разнообразные - попроще и посложнее, с фотографиями, с классическими вопросами или ассоциативными: «одним словом» либо «раз слово, два слово», как подсказки старца Фура. В любом журнале есть один англо-русский сканворд и один «дыркавнос», надеюсь, вы поймёте, почему его так назвали. На каждой странице вас встречает персонаж нашей весёлой семейки. Присоединяйтесь!

Все сканворды для читателя бесплатны. Это годовая коллекция: 52-53 номера по 20 сканвордов в каждом. Полный годовой арсенал сканвордов «съест» на телефоне около 50 Мбайт - картинки маленькие, текст - это текст. Мы ценим место на вашем телефоне.

Интернет для разгадывания не нужен. При условии, что сами сканворды уже на вашем телефоне. Каждую пятницу выходит новый номер журнала. Если вы оставили активной опцию «уведомление», то один раз в неделю в пятницу в 12-00 по местному времени придёт напоминание о новом номере. При входе в приложение загрузка нового журнала происходит автоматически и при её успешном завершении более не повторяется. Кроме того, можно загрузить или удалить на телефон поштучно любой из журналов, либо через «Настройки» скачать все журналы в один клик.

Основные возможности, в том числе доступ ко всем сканвордам, в приложении для читателя бесплатны. Банкет оплачивает рекламодатель. Ему разрешено иметь один узкий баннер на каждой странице + один показ межстраничной рекламы перед открытием сканворда. Наш рекламодатель не прерывает процесс разгадывания. Также рекламодатель щедро награждает читателя бесплатными подсказками за просмотр своих роликов. 

Любой читатель вправе, но не обязан, «перебить» рекламодателя, и: а) отключить рекламу навсегда, б) оформить подписку, которая на срок подписки отключает рекламу и даёт неограниченные подсказки, в) набрать подсказок на развес. Все эти возможности представлены на витрине в «Магазине».

Подписка - стандартный механизм Apple. 
1) Подписка возможна на три срока - неделя, месяц или год.
2) Подписка автоматически продлеваемая. Средства за возобновление подписки будут взиматься в течение 24 часов до конца текущего периода. 
3) Подписка подключается или отключается стандартно через iTunes, ссылка управления внизу. При желании отказаться от возобновления подписки пользователю необходимо это сделать не позднее, чем за 24 часа до конца текущего периода. При этом оплаченный период подписки отработает до конца. 

Политика конфиденциальности https://scanword.ru/privacy.html
Условия пользования https://scanword.ru/terms.html
Управление подпиской https://support.apple.com/ru-ru/HT202039

Aylık okul öncesi, çocuk ve gençlik kitapları gazetesi İyi Kitap, yetişkinlere yönelik içeriği ve görsel kalitesiyle, kitaplar hakkında eleştirel yazılara ve yazarlarla söyleşilere yer verir. Her ay ortalama 30.000 adet basılarak Türkiye genelindeki pek çok anaokulu, kreş, ilkokul, ortaokul, lise, üniversite, kültür merkezi, kırtasiye, kitabevi ve kütüphaneye ücretsiz dağıtılarak, okurların edebiyat dünyasındaki kitaplar hakkında kapsamlı bir şekilde bilgi edinmesini amaçlar. 2010 yılında yayın hayatına başlayan İyi Kitap, Tudem Yayın Grubuna ait özel bir kültür yayınıdır.

The New Yorker app is your digital destination for in-depth reporting, political and cultural commentary, fiction, and humor from New Yorker staff writers and contributors around the world.

Stay up to date. 
Read or listen to top stories from your favorite writers, every day. Turn on notifications so you never miss an important story or your favorite topic. 

Be transported.
News and politics. Books and culture. Fiction and poetry. Discover rich storytelling and rigorous reporting that will sweep you away and introduce you to something new. 

Go about your day.
When your hands are full, listen to featured stories read by world-class narrators. If you need a break, solve a crossword puzzle or Name Drop quiz, and flip through a nearly endless supply of cartoons. And, when you’re on the go, save stories to access them on any device, even offline.

The app is free to download. Subscribers receive unlimited access. Most current New Yorker subscribers have unlimited access to the app as part of their existing subscription. Subscribers with a print-only subscription may not have unlimited access. App subscribers have full access to the Web site, including the archive and most recent issue. Users who have trouble accessing stories can e-mail apps@newyorker.com for assistance. 

Non-subscribers may access the app by starting a free trial. A subscription costs $11.99 a month or $119.99 annually, and includes a 7-day free trial, after which it will automatically renew unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24 hours before the end of the current period. Account will be charged for renewal within 24 hours prior to the end of the current period and will state the cost of renewal. Any unused portion of a free trial period, if offered, will be forfeited when the user purchases a subscription to that publication, where applicable.

Subscriptions may be managed by the user, and auto-renewal may be turned off by updating the user’s App Store Subscription settings after purchase. Payment will be charged to iTunes account at confirmation of purchase.

Information about our Terms of Service & Privacy Policy can be found at http://www.condenast.com/privacy-policy.

A Note From Our Founder and Editor in Chief,
Hello! Welcome to Kandy Magazine. First, thank you to the 1% who clicked  ...more. When I founded Kandy 14 years ago, I had a simple mission - deliver a new kind of men's magazine. A magazine which was more visual than words. Our first 2012 iPad issue delivered. A year later our first iPhone issue raised the bar. We told stories visually more than textually. We were a hit!

In our early years, we kept to this vision, consistently publishing pictorials which told the story. A photo and a cute blurb or brief caption. As we grew in popularity - yes it is true that in 2014 we were the most popular magazine in the app store, more popular than People, Cosmo, Men's Health and GQ - higher profile celebrities desired the exposure Kandy delivered. To accommodate, we moved away from our fun, creative visual magazine towards your traditional, boring editorial magazine. That was our first mistake. 

Shortly thereafter, the new layout caught the attention of potential ad reps who advised we tone down the sexy and increase the text in articles. That was our second mistake. It did not take long for our readership to drop and our global audience as well. 

To be fair, our decline was not all self-induced. In our rocket ship rise to the top of the app store rankings, we maximized Apple's newsstand app exposure. It was where you went to discover magazines, much in the way when you would walk into a bookstore or by a street vendor magazine newsstand. It showed the current cover of the most recent issue and with our magazine covers who would not be intrigued to check out Kandy. However, in a perfect storm of events outside our influence, big publishers sold their private newsstand app to Apple which turned it into what you know today as News+. Kandy is excluded. 


Starting now, we are returning to our photo story issues. More girls, more photos, less words. What you wanted in the beginning and what you want today. We are not an adult magazine, there is no nudity. Our photos are classic glamour, bikini swimsuit and lingerie. I hope you enjoy Kandy.

They say every picture tells a story. Kandy digital / mobile magazine lets pictures tell the story. It is for men who enjoy Live Sports events, fitness and exercise programs combined with the latest men's fashion and watch style. You will become a Kandy magazine subscriber to the app.

If you are only fans of of Premier Leagues, UEFA or NFL football or enjoy F1, Rugby and Golf and the scores as well, Kandy magazine has all your live sporting interests covered.

Of course, any real man enjoys a wide range of topics, Kandy delivers what you need. Current trends for men's fashion, style and the hottest Rolex, Omega, Tag Heuer, Patek Philippe watches men are buying.

Are you old school, classic lads magazine reader who loved Loaded, Maxim magazine, FHM, Esquire, Nuts, Front, Zoo, Men's Health, Stuff and GQ? Kandy rolls all that good Stuff into its digital issues optimized for both iPads and iPhones. 

Follow us social media
Instagram @kandymazine
Facebook @kandymagazine
X @kandy_magazine
YouTube @kandymagazine

Haberler.com, sizi dünyanın nabzını tutmaya davet ediyor! Her gün milyonlarca insanın hayatını etkileyen güncel olayları takip etmek artık çok daha kolay. Uygulamamız, geniş ve güçlü editör ve muhabir kadrosuyla, en son haberleri anında size ulaştırıyor.

Ekonomiden siyasete, teknolojiden sağlığa, spor ve kültür dünyasına kadar geniş bir yelpazede haberleri keşfedin.

Ayrıca, Yerel Haberler bölümüyle bulunduğunuz şehirdeki önemli olaylardan da haberdar olun. Bu bilgiyi sadece o şehirdeki insanlara özel bildirimlerle doğrudan telefonlarına iletiriz.


Neden Haberler.com Uygulaması?

- Güvenilir Haber: Tarafsız ve  güvenilir haber akışı ile Türkiye’de ve Dünya’da olan olaylar ile ilgili doğru bilgi edinin.
- Kişiselleştirilmiş Deneyim: İlgi alanlarınıza ve tercihlerinize göre özelleştirilmiş bir haber akışıyla her gün en önemli gelişmeleri öğrenin.
- Canlı Bildirimler: Önemli gelişmeler olduğunda anında haberdar olun. Canlı bildirimlerle kritik olayları kaçırmayın.
- Mobil Uyumlu: İster evde, ister işte, ister seyahatte olun, haberlere her zaman ve her yerde erişim sağlayın.


Uygulamamızda 50 ’den fazla kategoride haber sunmaktayız. İşte bunlardan bazıları:

- Haberler: Dünya genelinden en son haberler ve gelişmeler.
- Ekonomi: Piyasaların güncel durumu, finansal analizler ve iş dünyasına dair önemli bilgiler.
- Siyaset / Politika: Ulusal ve uluslararası siyasi gelişmeler, liderlerin açıklamaları ve analizler.
- Teknoloji: Yenilikçi teknolojiler, dijital trendler ve teknoloji dünyasındaki en son haberler.
- Sağlık: Sağlık bilimleri, tıp alanındaki yeni keşifler, sağlık trendleri ve yaşam tarzı ipuçları.
- Spor: Futbol, basketbol, tenis ve daha birçok spor dalında en son skorlar, transferler ve maç analizleri.
- Kültür ve Sanat: Sanat, sinema, edebiyat ve popüler kültür hakkında güncel haberler ve eleştiriler.
- Analiz: Uzmanlarımızın derinlemesine analizleri ve yorumlarıyla olayları daha iyi anlayın.
- Haber uygulamamız ile dünyayı keşfedin, yerelde ve küreselde güncel kalmak için hiçbir şeyi kaçırmayın! İndirin ve haberlerin dünyasına adım atın.

Discover original reporting and understand the events shaping the world in The New York Times app. Follow breaking news and get live updates. Watch news videos that provide context on top stories. Listen to news podcasts, culture podcasts, narrated articles and more. Access a range of coverage for the U.S., Australia and the world, including investigations, cultural commentary and analysis.


Download the app to enjoy all of The Times, all in one place: breaking news and in-depth reporting, plus games, recipes, audio journalism, product reviews, sports coverage and more.



BREAKING NEWS AND LIVE UPDATES
- Push notifications deliver the latest headlines and developing stories as they happen.
- Your daily news app that helps you stay informed as news breaks.
- Add widgets and custom alerts to keep up with the latest Australian and world news.

ORIGINAL REPORTING AND IN-DEPTH ANALYSIS
- Read, watch and listen to investigative reporting and insights.
- Access global news from 1,700 Times journalists reporting from 150 countries.
- Explore complex stories brought to life through data and visual journalism.

NEWS VIDEOS
- Watch videos featuring reporters, critics and other experts.
- Get closer to the story with videos across news and culture.
- Understand breaking news, top stories, culture reporting and more, in video.

INFORMED AUDIO NEWS
- Listen to a variety of audio journalism, including podcasts and narrated articles.
- Tune in to daily podcasts like “The Daily” and “The Headlines.”

ARTS, SCIENCE, TECHNOLOGY AND LIFESTYLE COVERAGE
- Discover reporting across arts, culture, fashion, travel and more.
- Stay informed on topics like technology, science and health.
- Explore culture with podcasts like “Modern Love” and “The Interview.”

SAVE, FOLLOW AND PERSONALIZE
- Easily save and access articles on topics you care about.
- See what’s new for you with personalized recommendations based on your tastes and reading history.

WORD, VISUAL AND NUMBER GAMES
- Unwind with daily games like the Crossword, Wordle, Connections, the Mini, Spelling Bee and Sudoku.

INSPIRING RECIPES
- Explore recipe ideas for easy weeknight dinners, holiday showstoppers and more.

COMMUNITY CONVERSATIONS
- Engage with Times reporters and readers in our moderated comments section. 
- Subscribers can share 10 articles per month with anyone.

DIGITAL SUBSCRIPTIONS
Enjoy everything we offer with a New York Times All Access subscription, which includes unlimited access to:
— Investigations, culture and analysis from News
— Word, visual and number puzzles from Games
— Recipes, videos, advice and inspiration from Cooking
— Independent product reviews from Wirecutter
— In-depth, personalized sports coverage from The Athletic

BY DOWNLOADING THE NEW YORK TIMES APP, you agree to:

Sondakika, Türkiye ve Dünya’daki en önemli haberleri telefonunuzda hızlıca takip etmenizi sağlayan bir haber uygulamasıdır. Son dakika haber uygulaması siyaset, politika, magazin, spor, kadın, ekonomi, finans, futbol, 3. sayfa ve başka birçok kategorideki en önemli haber içeriklerini bir araya getiren benzersiz bir uygulamadır. Son dakika uygulamasını hürriyet, milliyet, haber7, mynet veya habertürk gibi diğer haber uygulamalarından ayıran en önemli özelliği kolay ve anlaşılır bir yapıya sahip olması; aynı zamanda haberleri geldikleri saate göre listelemesidir. Böylece haberler arasında gezinirken en yeni gelen haberi en üstte görürsünüz. Bu da benzersiz bir haber deneyimi yaşatır.

Sondakika haber uygulaması ile;
* Zengin içerikteki haberleri geliş saatlerine göre takip edersiniz.
* 2 farklı liste tasarımından size en kolay gelen görünümü seçip kullanırsınız.
* Haberlerin detaylarını öğrenirsiniz.
* Bir haberden sonraki habere veya önceki habere sağ-sol kaydırma yaparak kolayca geçersiniz.
* İlginizi çeken haberi istediğiniz şekilde paylaşırsınız.
* Son dakika haber bildirimleri ile güncel gelişmeleri en hızlı siz öğrenirsiniz.
* Bildirim ayarlarından sadece istediğiniz kategoride bildirim almayı isteyebilirsiniz. Böylece ilgiliniz çekmeyecek kategorilerdeki haberler için rahatsız edilmezsiniz.
* Sondakika haber widget ile uygulamayı açmadan son gelişmeleri görürsünüz.

Sondakika uygulaması Apple Watch ile uyumludur ve Apple Watch’tan haber ve bildirimleri hızlıca almanızı sağlar.

Sondakika uygulamasını bedava indirebilirsiniz. Hiçbir özellik için ekstra para ödemek zorunda değilsiniz. Sondakika haber programı tamamen bedavadır.

Sondakika uygulaması 7 gün 24 saat kesintisiz haber yayını yapar. Her türlü öneri ve şikayetleriniz için bize ulaşabilirsiniz: destek@brokoli.com.tr

Cosmopolitan UK 
 
If you love fashion, need to know the smartest beauty secrets, and want to read everything from hard-hitting reports to empowering careers advice, then Cosmopolitan is the magazine for you. Cosmo is packed with invaluable tips on everything from love, sex and relationships to body confidence and exclusive intimate interviews with your favourite celebs every month.

By downloading the Cosmopolitan UK app for free, you can either buy the single issues OR enjoy a 30-day free trial of Cosmo plus, save money off the cover price with one of the following subscription offers:

3 issues (3 months) at £5.99
6 issues (6 months) at £11.99
12 issues (1 year) at £19.99

If Cosmo isn’t for you, you can cancel at any time during your trial period and no payment will be taken.

By subscribing you’ll never miss an issue and the new editions will automatically download to your Apple device as soon as they are released.  Your whole magazine library travels with you and you always have the latest issue even when you’re away from home.

Back issues and current issues are available for purchase within the App.

The subscription will include the current issue if you do not already own it and subsequently published future issues. Payment will be charged to your iTunes Account at confirmation of purchase. This subscription will automatically renew unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24-hours before the end of the current period, your account will be charged for renewal within 24-hours prior to the end of the current period. The cost of the renewal will match the initial subscription price.

You may turn off auto-renewing subscriptions by going to your user’s Account Settings after purchase. No cancellation of the current subscription is allowed during your active subscription period. 

Please find our Terms and Conditions and Privacy Policy here: http://www.hearst.co.uk/terms-and-conditions

developer: Dow Jones & Company, Inc., publisher of The Wall Street Journal.
description:
WALL STREET JOURNAL (iOS) 

Download the WSJ App Today

Staying ahead of the competition means staying up to date with the facts. Get the trusted insights, in-depth analysis and real-time updates you need from the WSJ App.

Download the app today and subscribe to receive instant access to WSJ’s unrivaled journalism covering today’s top stories across finance, politics, business, tech, the economy and more. Enjoy exclusive newsletters and videos that dive deeper into the stories that matter.

Key benefits include:

Customizable App Experience 
(+) Follow your your favorite WSJ journalists
(+) Access interactive charts to follow the latest market trends
(+) Create personalized stock watch lists 
(+) Get content relevant to your job title and industry

Award-winning Journalism Delivered To Your Mobile Device
(+) A real-time news feed, curated by WSJ’s award-winning journalists throughout the day
(+) Up to date global coverage on the news that matters 
(+) Access to curated CFO, CIO, and CMO article feeds

Full Access to WSJ, Anywhere, Anytime
(+) Full access to WSJ on any device
(+) Ability to listen to WSJ articles on your commute, hands-free
(+) Offline reading, enabling you to remain informed, wherever you are

Real Time Market News - Never Miss a Critical Development
(+) Up to the minute stock market quotes
(+) Alerts and notifications for breaking news and updates on the stories, companies and industries that matter most to you
(+) Articles relevant to your personalized stock list

The WSJ App provides comprehensive access that will help you better understand and navigate the complexities of today’s financial world. Regardless of your investing experience, download the app to make more sound financial decisions. 

Stay ahead, stay informed – with The Wall Street Journal App.


Your subscription will renew automatically each month and payment will be charged to your iTunes Account within 24-hours prior to the end of the current period. You can turn off auto-renewal by going to your Account Settings after purchase. No cancellation of your subscription is allowed during the active subscription period. Any unused portion of a free trial or introductory period, if offered, will be forfeited when you purchase a subscription to WSJ, where applicable.

By downloading the app you agree to the Dow Jones Terms of Use, Privacy Notice, and Cookie Notice.

developer: BUNDLE HABER BILISIM TEKNOLOJI ANONIM SIRKETI
description:
Bundle is the most comprehensive and top-rated free news aggregator that brings together all the latest news you need to know throughout the day. With Bundle, you have everything you shouldn't miss at your fingertips, featuring top headlines, breaking news, and a multitude of sources across different interest areas such as the stock market, science and technology, finance, sports, and politics.

• My Bundle - Ready to be added to your personal collection for free from over 10,000 news sources, online publishers, magazines, newspapers, opinion pieces, and blogs from 18 different countries. Stay informed and inspired by leading publications such as The Guardian, TIME, The New York Times, Business Insider, Bloomberg, Mashable, and more!

• Breaking news – With Bundle, you receive instant notifications for the day's most important developments and standout headlines, ensuring you stay informed before anyone else in a refined, accurate, and unbiased manner.

• Save time by summarizing news – Utilize Bundle AI, the productive artificial intelligence developed by Bundle, to summarize news content with just one touch. Instead of reading the entire news, you can quickly get to the most important points.

• Escape clickbait headlines – Bundle AI organizes deceptive and non-informative news headlines used by some outlets to gain more clicks, making the headlines more understandable for users.

• Unique search feature – Bundle provides instant results based on the keywords you search for. Easily search through all news, headlines, authors, and more.

• Reader Mode – If ads on the page of the media outlet you follow distract you, you can focus solely on content by switching to Reader Mode.

• Offline Mode – Whether you're on the subway or in a dead zone, you can continue reading all the content loaded into your news feed even if your connection is lost.

• Latest news – Bundle delivers the latest news to users instantly. With Bundle, you'll be the first to know the most popular and important news from various categories such as technology, sports, politics, economy, and science, tailored to your interests.

• The world at your fingertips – Read news and content from 18 different countries, including the UK, France, Germany, and worldwide, to stay informed about local agendas.

• Go beyond the agenda – With Hot Bundle, featuring the daily selections of Bundle editors, you access the most engaging, inspiring, and mind-opening content.

• Don't lose, save it – If you can't find time to read a piece of news immediately, save it and read it at your convenience.

• Easy to use, hard to let go – With Bundle's award-winning design and user-friendly interface, you can easily access the news you want and glance through all of it at once. If your internet quota is limited, you can turn off news images or use the dark theme option if white light strains your eyes. Log in with your social media account to synchronize your saved news and followed sources across all your devices.

Terms of Use and Privacy Agreement: https://www.bundletheworld.com/mobileapp/termsofuse/en

In addition to all of this, you can follow all developments related to both current events and Bundle on our Facebook, Instagram, and X accounts! Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/bundlenews/ X: https://twitter.com/bundleapp/ Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/bundlehaber/

We would be delighted to hear any suggestions, comments, and questions you may have about Bundle: You can always reach us through the "Settings>Send Feedback" section in the app and at support@bundlenews.co. For more information, you can visit our website: www.bundle.app/en

A PLAY Games é uma publicação mensal que concentra - há mais de dez anos - as maiores novidades, lançamentos, análises, dicas e curiosidades deste segmento. Sua especialidade são detonados, roteiros completos e minuciosos dos jogos mais populares da geração PlayStation.

Faça o download grátis da PLAY Games e compre edições avulsas ou assine diretamente do seu iPad, iPhone ou iPod Touch. 

• Assinatura auto-renovável PlayStation - Revista Oficial 

• Duração da assinatura e quantidade de edições enviadas durante a assinatura: 
• Assinatura de 1 ano (1 year subscription) – 12 edições 
• Assinatura de 6 meses (6 months subscription) – 6 edições 
• Assinatura de 1 mês (1 month subscription) – 1 edição 

• Preço da assinatura auto-renovável e edições avulsas: 
• Assinatura de 1 ano - Preço: US$ 30.99 (automaticamente renovada até que seja cancelada) 
• Assinatura de 6 meses - Preço: US$ 15.99 (automaticamente renovada até que seja cancelada) 
• Assinatura de 1 mês - Preço: US$ 2.99 (automaticamente renovada até que seja cancelada) 
• Edição avulsa – Preço: US$ 2.99 

• O pagamento será debitado da sua conta do iTunes no momento da confirmação da compra 

• A assinatura é renovada automaticamente a menos que a renovação automática seja cancelada pelo menos 24 horas antes do final do período vigente 

• A renovação da sua assinatura será cobrada no prazo de 24 horas antes do final do período vigente e identificada o custo da renovação 

• As assinaturas podem ser gerenciados pelo usuário e a auto-renovação pode ser cancelada. Isso pode ser feito nas configurações da conta do usuário após a compra 

• Nenhum cancelamento da assinatura atual é permitida durante o período de assinatura vigente 

• Por favor, encontre nossos Termos e Condições e Política de Privacidade em: http://www.europanet.com.br/privacidade/ios/ 


Caso você seja assinante da revista impressa, basta entrar no app com seu e-mail e código de assinante para acessar suas revistas digitais gratuitamente. 

Qualquer dúvida, entre em contato com a nosso suporte técnico pelo e-mail: suportedigital@europanet.com.br
